Installation
============

.. note:: WaterTAP3 supports Python 3.6 and above.

Using Pip
---------
The standard utility for installing Python packages is ``pip``. 
You can install WaterTAP3 in your system Python installation by executing::

   pip install watertap3


Dependencies
------------
WaterTAP3 has special dependencies on a variety of third-party Python packages.
To avoid conflicting dependencies, we recommend you to use ``conda`` to manage the environment.
